summary: All men beware, the beautiful and seductive Siren have returned to skyrim and their hunger for humanflesh is immense...
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qcs38cqw.png[/img]
At first of all I\'m not a very good english speaker, so don\'t flame all the time i make a strange grammar mistake or stuff like that, I hope you considerate, and you have fun with that mod. :)
for more details scroll down...

My recent work:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33799/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img845/8749/nozdormuthumbnail.jpg[/IMG]
[/URL] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/222939][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img248/8885/mottensegenthumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/241104/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img812/5631/barbarianthumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/221475][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img197/808/viljathumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/222943][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img43/1299/1thumbr.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/226537][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img14/831/triophinethumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/228986][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img855/5835/fallentoashesthumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/232688][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/3385/claritythumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/234772][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img835/5349/midnightthumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/235082][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img211/1075/sirenthumb.jpg[/IMG][/URL]




here some nice done videointroductions:
[youtube]qUg6WxsiNvs[/youtube]
[youtube]xttE0SuWU7M[/youtube]
...for the spanish players :)
[youtube]cKFCBJfGcLQ[/youtube]
[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qq4t9d6m.png[/img]
This is a typical Race mod which adds a Race called \"The Siren\", to the game, this Racemod includes also:

  -  a new retextured armor
  -  3 different bodytypes
  -  14 unique eyes
  -  3 unique Bodytextures 
  -  4 new abilities
  -  4 unique eyebrows

[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qq4z3dtb.png[/img]
The Sirens are as beautiful as dangerous, they can paralyze by one view and their charm is legendary. is something denied by charm, they get it with their knowledge of destructionmagic. The Most of them live in the deep and blue abecean sea nearby the mountains of high rock. Their city\'s are made up of giant magical bright Corals. The Corals protect them from their archenemies, the sharkmen. 

Stats:

Illusion:    +15
Alteration:  +5
Conjuration: +5
Destruction: +10
One-handed:  +5
Enchanting:  +5
Speech:      +5

New Spells and abilities:

- Siren-watervision         (better vision in the dark/water)
- Siren-fury                   (thunderbolt which deals 120 dmg, one time a day)
- Siren-Paralyze             (Paralyze for 15 sec, one time a day)
- Siren-waterbreathing   (waterbreathing)

The forsaken armour has the same stats as the glass armour, it is craftable and enchantable

At the moment there this is a female-only version(male gender will look screwed, so don\'t try this)

follower(s) for the mod can you download here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23842]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23842[/url]

[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qq4xt18v.png[/img]
NMM Installation is always recommended!!

doing by hand:
just drag and drop the Data-folder into the tes V folder, say yes when it asks.(don\'t worry it won\'t replace anything)



[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qq4y7ezn.png[/img]
 Version 2.0
 added:
 -  4 new eyes
 -  a retextured glass armor (non-replacer, don\'t worry)
 -  better vampires compatible version
 
added:

 -  every body comes with its own texture
 -  cbbe_v3 nudetextures
 -  ADEC body compatibility
 -  unp/bbp body compatibility...

... as optional files

 1.1 Update

 -  slight changes to the face diffuse
 -  fixed spec
 -  added 2 new eyelinercolors
 -  added 2 new lipcolors
 -  added 2 new cheek colors
 -  added 4 complexion/ frekles detailmap

 
1.0 Release-Version

 added:

  -  10 unique eyes
  -  2 unique Bodytextures (only choose one, a shiny and the normal one)
  -  4 new abilities (not new spells!)
  -  4 unique eyebrows...
... to the Siren Race

[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qq4zkdzm.png[/img]
- retextured vampirelord (special for siren)
- seperate male-race (maybe the sharkmen;P) = please be patient I do my best to release them             soon
- improved normal-maps(for better seastars)
- clothes & weapons

[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qq4yo8hu.png[/img]
- if you use better vampires by Brehanin, deny to overwrite the  PlayerVampireQuestScript.psc/pex!! (fixed with the better vampires version)

- works with dawnguard (become a sirenvampirelord;))
  only bug i noticed was that i lost my siren-textures, when i left the vampire-lord-form, and got     the normal female textures (trying to fix this immediatly)

-At the moment this is a female-only version (male gender will look screwed, so don\'t try this)

- at the first charactercreation, the facemorph could be different to the showracemenu facemorph. If it is a problem to you, i\'ll try to fix it, atm I let it the way it is

- if u find any bugs (which aren\'t listed above) please let me know

feel free to use my textures, just give me credits if you make a own mod.

[img]http://upload.pokefans.net/m43_5qq509a7j.png[/img]
- Killer Keo for the forsaken armor mesh
- Acdale for ADEC
- Dimon99 for unp
- Caliente for cbbe_v3 body
- me for the idea, the retex on body and the race itself
- Bethesda for ck and (awesome) skyrim
author: kampfsteak
